casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Ward AYERS 295P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 12, 2018 Sean Paul Vitrano, Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, for Ayers, Charles Ward Alesia Mikhaulauna Balshakova, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of September 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of September 2018."
